pageContext.title: In brief: Korean AI startup raises funding in round led by Golden Gate Ventures
pageContext.content:
Skelter Labs, a Korean AI startup, has pulled an undisclosed amount of funding, led by Singapore-based Golden Gate Ventures. KakaoBrain, Kakao Ventures, Stonebridge Ventures, and Lotte Homeshopping also joined the round.

The startup will use the fresh capital to expand into Japan and parts of Southeast Asia, including Vietnam, Thailand, and Malaysia.

Source: TechCrunch

Correction (Nov. 5, 4:30 pm): The funding amount was removed after Skelter Labs reached out to TIA to say that it didnâ€™t raise US$10 million.

seo.title: In brief: Korean AI startup nabs US$10m in fresh funding
seo.description: The Seoul-based AI startup plans on using the fresh capital to expand into Southeast Asia and Japan.
